SQLResource.query: SELECT MO.TABLE_ID , MO.COLUMN_ID FROM MASTER_ORG MO , ( SELECT COMP_CD , MST_ORG_CD FROM HQ_USER WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND USER_ID = ${SCH_USER_ID} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) U WHERE MO.COMP_CD = U.COMP_CD AND MO.MST_ORG_CD = U.MST_ORG_CD AND MO.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND MO.TABLE_ID = 'STORE' AND MO.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MO.TABLE_ID, MO.COLUMN_ID

SELECT S.COMP_CD , S.BRAND_CD , NVL(BL.BRAND_NM, B.BRAND_NM) AS BRAND_NM , S.STOR_CD , S.STOR_NM AS STOR_NM , SL.STOR_NM AS STOR_LANG_NM , S.STOR_TP , C1.STOR_TP_NM , S.STOR_TG , C12.CODE_NM AS STOR_TG_NM , S.DSTN_COMP , D.STOR_NM AS DSTN_COMP_NM , S.BUSI_NO , S.SUB_BUSI_NO , S.BUSI_NM , S.BUSI_TP , S.BUSI_CT , S.TEL_NO , S.FAX , S.ZIP_CD , S.ADDR1 || ' ' || S.ADDR2 AS ADDR , S.BILL_ADDR , S.TABLE_NO , S.SEAT , S.SIDO_CD , C4.SIDO_NM , S.REGION_CD , C2.REGION_NM , S.TRAD_AREA , C3.TRAD_AREA_NM , S.APP_DIV , C10.APP_DIV_NM , S.OPEN_DT , S.DEPT_CD , C5.DEPT_NM , S.TEAM_CD , C6.TEAM_NM , S.SV_USER_ID , U.USER_NM AS SV_USER_NM , S.USE_YN , LN.NATION_NM , LR.REGION_NM AS REGION_NO_NM , LC.CURRENCY_NM FROM BRAND B , TABLE (FC_GET_AUTH_STORE_INFO(${SCH_COMP_CD}, ${SCH_USER_ID})) A , STORE S , ( SELECT COMP_CD , PK_COL AS BRAND_CD , LANG_NM AS BRAND_NM FROM LANG_TABLE WHERE TABLE_NM = 'BRAND' AND COL_NM = 'BRAND_NM' AND COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) BL , ( SELECT COMP_CD , BRAND_CD , STOR_CD , STOR_NM FROM LANG_STORE WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) SL , ( SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.CODE_CD AS STOR_TP , NVL(L.CODE_NM, C.CODE_NM) AS STOR_TP_NM FROM COMMON C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , CODE_TP , CODE_CD , CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '00565' AND LANGUAGE_TP= ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE C.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CODE_TP = '00565' AND C.VAL_C1 = 'S' -- 매장만 AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C1 , ( SELECT DISTINCT R.COMP_CD , R.CITY_CD AS CITY_CD , R.REGION_CD AS REGION_CD , NVL(L.LANG_NM, R.REGION_NM) AS REGION_NM FROM REGION R , ( SELECT COMP_CD , PK_COL , LANG_NM FROM LANG_TABLE WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND TABLE_NM = 'REGION' AND COL_NM = 'REGION_NM' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE R.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND LPAD(R.NATION_CD, 3, ' ')||LPAD(R.CITY_CD, 3, ' ')||LPAD(R.REGION_CD, 6, ' ') = L.PK_COL(+) AND R.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND R.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C2 , ( SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.CODE_CD AS TRAD_AREA , NVL(L.CODE_NM, C.CODE_NM) AS TRAD_AREA_NM FROM COMMON C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , CODE_TP , CODE_CD , CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '00595' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE C.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CODE_TP = '00595' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C3 , ( SELECT R.COMP_CD , R.NATION_CD , R.CITY_CD , R.REGION_CD AS SIDO_CD , NVL(L.LANG_NM, R.REGION_NM) AS SIDO_NM FROM REGION R , LANG_TABLE L WHERE L.COMP_CD(+) = R.COMP_CD AND L.PK_COL(+) = LPAD(R.NATION_CD, 3, ' ')||LPAD(R.CITY_CD, 3, ' ')||LPAD(R.REGION_CD, 6, ' ') AND R.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND R.CITY_CD = '000' AND R.USE_YN = 'Y' AND L.TABLE_NM(+) = 'REGION' AND L.COL_NM(+) = 'REGION_NM' AND L.LANGUAGE_TP(+)= ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND L.USE_YN(+) = 'Y' ) C4 , ( SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.CODE_CD AS DEPT_CD , NVL(L.CODE_NM, C.CODE_NM) AS DEPT_NM FROM COMMON C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , CODE_TP , CODE_CD , CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '00600' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE C.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CODE_TP = '00600' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C5 , ( SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.CODE_CD AS TEAM_CD , NVL(L.CODE_NM, C.CODE_NM) AS TEAM_NM FROM COMMON C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , CODE_TP , CODE_CD , CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '00605' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE C.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CODE_TP = '00605' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C6 , ( SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.CODE_CD AS APP_DIV , NVL(L.CODE_NM, C.CODE_NM) AS APP_DIV_NM FROM COMMON C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , CODE_TP , CODE_CD , CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '02345' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE C.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CODE_TP = '02345' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C10 , ( SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.CODE_CD AS BRAND_CLASS , NVL(L.CODE_NM, C.CODE_NM) AS BRAND_CLASS_NM FROM COMMON C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , CODE_TP , CODE_CD , CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '01845' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE C.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CODE_TP = '01845' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C11 , ( SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.CODE_CD AS CODE_CD , NVL(L.CODE_NM, C.CODE_NM) AS CODE_NM FROM COMMON C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , CODE_TP , CODE_CD , CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '02035' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE C.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CODE_TP = '02035' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C12 , ( SELECT U.COMP_CD , U.USER_ID , NVL(L.LANG_NM, U.USER_NM) AS USER_NM FROM HQ_USER U , ( SELECT COMP_CD , PK_COL , LANG_NM FROM LANG_TABLE WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND TABLE_NM = 'HQ_USER' AND COL_NM = 'USER_NM' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE L.COMP_CD(+) = U.COMP_CD AND L.PK_COL(+) = LPAD(U.USER_ID, 10, ' ') AND U.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} ) U , ( SELECT S.COMP_CD , S.STOR_CD , NVL(L.STOR_NM, S.STOR_NM) AS STOR_NM FROM STORE S , ( SELECT COMP_CD , BRAND_CD , STOR_CD , STOR_NM FROM LANG_STORE WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE S.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND S.BRAND_CD = L.BRAND_CD(+) AND S.STOR_CD = L.STOR_CD(+) AND S.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND S.BRAND_CD = '0000' AND S.STOR_TP = '40' ) D , ( SELECT LN.NATION_CD , NVL(L.LANG_NM, LN.NATION_NM) AS NATION_NM FROM L_NATION LN , ( SELECT PK_COL , LANG_NM FROM LANG_TABLE WHERE COMP_CD = 'ZZZ' AND TABLE_NM = 'L_NATION' AND COL_NM = 'NATION_NM' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE L.PK_COL(+) = LPAD(LN.NATION_CD, 3, ' ') AND LN.USE_YN = 'Y' ) LN , ( SELECT LR.NATION_CD , LR.REGION_NO , NVL(L.LANG_NM, LR.REGION_NM) AS REGION_NM FROM L_REGION LR , ( SELECT PK_COL , LANG_NM FROM LANG_TABLE WHERE COMP_CD = 'ZZZ' AND TABLE_NM = 'L_REGION' AND COL_NM = 'REGION_NM' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE L.PK_COL(+) = LPAD(LR.NATION_CD, 3, ' ')||LPAD(LR.REGION_NO, 3, ' ') AND LR.USE_YN = 'Y' ) LR , ( SELECT LC.CURRENCY_CD , NVL(L.LANG_NM, LC.CURRENCY_FNM) AS CURRENCY_NM FROM L_CURRENCY LC , ( SELECT PK_COL , LANG_NM FROM LANG_TABLE WHERE COMP_CD = 'ZZZ' AND TABLE_NM = 'L_CURRENCY' AND COL_NM = 'CURRENCY_FNM' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE L.PK_COL(+) = LPAD(LC.CURRENCY_CD, 3, ' ') AND LC.USE_YN = 'Y' ) LC WHERE B.COMP_CD = A.COMP_CD AND B.BRAND_CD = A.BRAND_CD AND A.COMP_CD = S.COMP_CD AND A.BRAND_CD = S.BRAND_CD AND A.STOR_CD = S.STOR_CD AND BL.COMP_CD(+) = B.COMP_CD AND BL.BRAND_CD(+) = LPAD(B.BRAND_CD,4,' ') AND S.COMP_CD = SL.COMP_CD (+) AND S.BRAND_CD = SL.BRAND_CD (+) AND S.STOR_CD = SL.STOR_CD (+) AND S.COMP_CD = C1.COMP_CD AND S.STOR_TP = C1.STOR_TP AND S.COMP_CD = C2.COMP_CD (+) AND S.SIDO_CD = C2.CITY_CD (+) AND S.REGION_CD = C2.REGION_CD (+) AND S.COMP_CD = C3.COMP_CD (+) AND S.TRAD_AREA = C3.TRAD_AREA (+) AND S.COMP_CD = C10.COMP_CD (+) AND S.APP_DIV = C10.APP_DIV (+) AND S.COMP_CD = C4.COMP_CD (+) AND S.SIDO_CD = C4.SIDO_CD (+) AND S.COMP_CD = C5.COMP_CD (+) AND S.DEPT_CD = C5.DEPT_CD (+) AND S.COMP_CD = C6.COMP_CD (+) AND S.TEAM_CD = C6.TEAM_CD (+) AND B.COMP_CD = C11.COMP_CD (+) AND B.BRAND_CLASS = C11.BRAND_CLASS(+) AND S.COMP_CD = C12.COMP_CD (+) AND S.STOR_TG = C12.CODE_CD (+) AND S.COMP_CD = U.COMP_CD (+) AND S.SV_USER_ID = U.USER_ID (+) AND S.COMP_CD = D.COMP_CD (+) AND S.DSTN_COMP = D.STOR_CD (+) AND S.NATION_CD = LN.NATION_CD (+) AND S.NATION_CD = LR.NATION_CD (+) AND S.REGION_NO = LR.REGION_NO (+) AND S.CURRENCY_CD = LC.CURRENCY_CD(+) AND S.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND (${SCH_BRAND_CD} IS NULL OR S.BRAND_CD = ${SCH_BRAND_CD}) AND (${SCH_STOR_TP} IS NULL OR S.STOR_TP = ${SCH_STOR_TP}) AND (${SCH_STOR_TG} IS NULL OR S.STOR_TG = ${SCH_STOR_TG}) AND (${SCH_DEPT_CD} IS NULL OR S.DEPT_CD = ${SCH_DEPT_CD}) AND (${SCH_TEAM_CD} IS NULL OR S.TEAM_CD = ${SCH_TEAM_CD}) AND (${SCH_SV_USER_ID} IS NULL OR S.SV_USER_ID = ${SCH_SV_USER_ID}) AND (${SCH_TRAD_AREA} IS NULL OR S.TRAD_AREA = ${SCH_TRAD_AREA}) AND (${SCH_APP_DIV} IS NULL OR S.APP_DIV = ${SCH_APP_DIV}) AND (${SCH_USE_YN} IS NULL OR S.USE_YN = ${SCH_USE_YN}) AND (${SCH_STOR_CD} IS NULL OR S.STOR_CD = ${SCH_STOR_CD}) ORDER BY B.BRAND_CLASS, S.BRAND_CD, S.STOR_TP, S.STOR_CD

SELECT S.COMP_CD , S.BRAND_CD , S.STOR_CD , S.STOR_TP , S.STOR_TG , S.STOR_NM , L.STOR_NM AS STOR_LANG_NM , S.REP_STOR_CD , S.ERP_STOR_CD , S.BUSI_NO , S.SUB_BUSI_NO , S.BUSI_NM , S.BUSI_TP , S.BUSI_CT , S.APP_DIV , S.CONTRACT_DIV , S.CONTRACT_NM , S.EXECUTE_NM , S.OFFER_TM , S.COMM_YN , S.INSHOP_YN , S.SIDO_CD , S.REGION_CD , S.TRAD_AREA , S.DEPT_CD , S.TEAM_CD , S.SV_USER_ID , S.DV_USER_ID , S.STOR_FORM , S.TEL_NO , S.FAX , S.REST_AREA_TP , S.ZIP_CD , S.ADDR1 , S.ADDR2 , S.BILL_ADDR , S.ADDR1_ENG , S.ADDR2_ENG , S.E_MAIL , S.OPEN_DT , S.CLOSE_DT , S.SEAT , S.SPACE , S.USE_YN , S.CURRENCY_CD , S.SELF_POS_YN , S.NATION_CD , S.REGION_NO , S.DSTN_COMP , W.STOR_NM AS DSTN_COMP_NM , S.BRAND_CD AS ORG_BRAND_CD FROM STORE S , STORE W , ( SELECT COMP_CD , BRAND_CD , STOR_CD , STOR_NM FROM LANG_STORE WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND BRAND_CD = ${SCH_BRAND_CD} AND STOR_CD = ${SCH_STOR_CD} AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE S.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND S.BRAND_CD = L.BRAND_CD(+) AND S.STOR_CD = L.STOR_CD(+) AND S.COMP_CD = W.COMP_CD(+) AND S.DSTN_COMP = W.STOR_CD(+) AND S.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND S.BRAND_CD = ${SCH_BRAND_CD} AND S.STOR_CD = ${SCH_STOR_CD}

SELECT SO.COMP_CD , SO.BRAND_CD , SO.STOR_CD , SO.MSG_BOARD_DIV , SO.PST_CASE_DIV , SO.MENU_BOARD_SIZE , SO.MENU_BOARD_QTY , SO.SHOW_CASE_TP , SO.BANN_HOLD_TP , SO.STOR_CONCEPT , SO.DROP_COFFEE_TP , SO.SPCL_TEA_TP , SO.PLAT_SALE_YN , SO.COLD_MEAL_YN , SO.ALL_TIME_TP , SO.SPACE , SO.TERS_EXIST_YN , SO.SMOK_ROOM_YN , SO.REST_ROOM_TP , SO.PARK_LOT_YN , SO.SIGN_VENDOR , SO.FACI_VENDOR , SO.FACI_USER_NM , ST.SELF_POS_YN , SO.USE_YN FROM STORE_OPTION SO , STORE ST WHERE SO.COMP_CD = ST.COMP_CD AND SO.BRAND_CD = ST.BRAND_CD AND SO.STOR_CD = ST.STOR_CD AND SO.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND SO.BRAND_CD = ${SCH_BRAND_CD} AND SO.STOR_CD = ${SCH_STOR_CD}

SELECT C.COMP_CD , NVL(F.BRAND_CD, ${SCH_BRAND_CD}) AS BRAND_CD , NVL(F.STOR_CD , ${SCH_STOR_CD}) AS STOR_CD , C.CODE_CD AS WEEK_DAY , C.CODE_NM AS WEEK_DAY_NM , F.START_HM , F.CLOSE_HM FROM ( SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.CODE_CD , NVL(L.CODE_NM, C.CODE_NM) AS CODE_NM , C.SORT_SEQ FROM COMMON C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , CODE_TP , CODE_CD , CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '00285' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE C.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CODE_TP = '00285' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , BRAND_CD , STOR_CD , WEEK_DAY , START_HM , CLOSE_HM FROM STORE_WEEK WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND BRAND_CD = ${SCH_BRAND_CD} AND STOR_CD = ${SCH_STOR_CD} ) F WHERE C.COMP_CD = F.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_CD = F.WEEK_DAY(+) ORDER BY C.SORT_SEQ, C.CODE_CD

SELECT C.COMP_CD , NVL(F.BRAND_CD, ${SCH_BRAND_CD}) AS BRAND_CD , NVL(F.STOR_CD , ${SCH_STOR_CD}) AS STOR_CD , C.STOR_FG , C.STOR_FG_NM , C.STOR_DT_CD , C.STOR_DT_NM , NVL(F.USE_YN, 'N') AS USE_YN FROM ( SELECT SF.COMP_CD , SF.CODE_TP , SF.CODE_CD AS STOR_FG , SF.CODE_NM AS STOR_FG_NM , SD.CODE_CD AS STOR_DT_CD , SD.CODE_NM AS STOR_DT_NM FROM ( SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.VAL_C1 AS CODE_TP , C.CODE_CD AS CODE_CD , NVL(L.CODE_NM, C.CODE_NM) AS CODE_NM FROM COMMON C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , CODE_TP , CODE_CD , CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '01065' AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE C.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CODE_TP = '01065' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) SF , ( SELECT C.COMP_CD , C.CODE_TP , C.CODE_CD , NVL(L.CODE_NM, C.CODE_NM) AS CODE_NM FROM COMMON C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , CODE_TP , CODE_CD , CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP IN ( SELECT VAL_C1 FROM COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '01065' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) AND LANGUAGE_TP = ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L WHERE C.COMP_CD = L.COMP_CD(+) AND C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND C.CODE_TP IN ( SELECT VAL_C1 FROM COMMON WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND CODE_TP = '01065' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ) SD WHERE SF.CODE_TP = SD.CODE_TP ) C , ( SELECT COMP_CD , BRAND_CD , STOR_CD , STOR_FG , STOR_DT_CD , USE_YN FROM STORE_FLAG WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND BRAND_CD = ${SCH_BRAND_CD} AND STOR_CD = ${SCH_STOR_CD} ) F WHERE C.COMP_CD = F.COMP_CD(+) AND C.STOR_FG = F.STOR_FG(+) AND C.STOR_DT_CD= F.STOR_DT_CD(+) ORDER BY C.STOR_FG, C.STOR_DT_CD

SELECT SC.COMP_CD , SC.BRAND_CD , SC.REP_STOR_CD , SC.SEQ_NO , SC.STOR_CD , SC.STOR_NM , SC.BUSI_NO , SC.BUSI_NM , SC.CONTRACT_DT , SC.EXPIRATION_DT , SC.SEAL_DT , SC.RECONTRACT_DT , SC.OPEN_DT , CASE WHEN SC.EXPIRATION_DT IS NOT NULL THEN TRUNC(TO_DATE(SC.EXPIRATION_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(SC.OPEN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 0) WHEN SC.OPEN_DT IS NOT NULL THEN TRUNC(SYSDATE - TO_DATE(SC.OPEN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 0) END AS ACC_BUSI_DAYS , SC.INSURE_YN , SC.STOR_STAT , GET_COMMON_CODE_NM(SC.COMP_CD, '02170', SC.STOR_STAT, ${SCH_LANGUAGE_TP}) AS STOR_STAT_NM , SC.REASON , SC.STOR_REMARK , SC.INFO_OPEN_YN , SC.EXPT_SALE_YN , SC.LOCL_STOR_YN , SC.CONTRACT_REMARK FROM STORE_CONTRACT SC , STORE ST WHERE SC.COMP_CD = ST.COMP_CD AND SC.REP_STOR_CD = ST.REP_STOR_CD AND ST.COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND ST.BRAND_CD = ${SCH_BRAND_CD} AND ST.STOR_CD = ${SCH_STOR_CD} ORDER BY SC.COMP_CD , SC.BRAND_CD , SC.REP_STOR_CD , SC.SEQ_NO DESC

SELECT COMP_CD , BRAND_CD , STOR_CD , POS_NO , POS_NM , IP_ADDR , TRANS_TYPE , TOP_IMAGE_YN , USE_YN FROM STORE_POS_MST WHERE COMP_CD = ${SCH_COMP_CD} AND BRAND_CD = ${SCH_BRAND_CD} AND STOR_CD = ${SCH_STOR_CD} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY POS_NO
